description:
~ Game introduction ~
The maid "Marie" who lost her memory and the doctor "Hime" who helped her
And it is a short dot animation H training game woven by the three assistants "Kotone".

~ Play content ~
The main content is that Marie collects medicine materials for Hime.
And it is possible to "educate" Mary at night.

~ Etch scene ~
The H scene is developed with dot animation, and with dialogue and sound effects.
Enjoy powerful dot animation using the entire screen!

In addition, a recollection mode is also installed! You can watch the H dot animation once you have seen it as many times as you like.
In free mode, you can freely change the speed and animation.

~ Multi-ending ~
The ending diverges depending on the stage at which Hime finishes training.
Please look forward to it!

~ Bonus element ~
<Let's play with Kotone!>
This is a mini-game where you can change the character "Kotone" that appears in the main story.
Animate even when you change clothes!
You can make very detailed settings, so please try it!
